Blog.post: Do you like our owl? Artificial? Of course it is. Must be expensive? Very ! I'am Rachael Deckard. It seems you "feel" our work is not a benifit to the public. I don't know what was up with that funky sentence structure, in that last blog but I did not plan it. This thing sofar to quote the great Art Carney has been "like crazy, baby", he actually did say that you just had to be there to hear it. And it's been a little strange to get used to the structure. But I am glad to make this progress. Time now for the reading of the day, but before it looks like two different colors: maybe I will try for three. "With one member trimming beef in a cannery, and another working in a sausage factory the family had a first hand knowledge of the great majority of Packing- town swindles." chapter 14 of "The Jungle" Depending on where you stand, this sounds like either the new "dirty tricks" of the right, or the dastardly plans lady Hilliary got cooking in her coven.
